metadata.title: CVE-2015-5715 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The mw_editPost function in wp-includes/class-wp-xmlrpc-server.php in theXMLRPC subsystem in WordPress before 4.3.1 allows remote authenticatedusers to bypass intended access restrictions, and arrange for a privatepost to be published and sticky, via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
